Description of incident: A dishonest employee was arrested for using customer debit and credit card numbers to make online purchases.  The employee was charged with 21 counts of deceptive practice, 21 counts of identity theft, four counts of felony theft, and 17 counts of misdemeanor theft.  Anyone who used debit or credit cards at the Peoria Heights McDonald's between September 15 and October 30, 2011 may be at risk.  The stolen account numbers came from CEFCU debit cards.
